import React, { useEffect, useRef } from "react"; import styles from "./Carousel.module.css"; const carousel = () => { const carouselRef = useRef(); useEffect(() => { carouselRef.current.style.scrollBehavior = "unset"; carouselRef.current.scrollBy(1023, 0); }); const onCarouselScrollHandler = () => { console.log("scroll left", carouselRef.current.scrollLeft); console.log("scroll width", carouselRef.current.scrollOffsetWidth + carouselRef.current.scrollLeft); } return (
